text: Va agar ʙar onho (ja'ne munofiqone ki hukmi toƣutro ʙar hukmi Alloh ʙartar doştand) voçiʙ megardondem, ki xeştanro ʙikuşed, jo az sarzaminhojaton ʙerun ʙiraved, çuz şumorai andake az onho cunin namekardand va agar on ciro mekardand, ki ʙa on pand doda meşavand hamono ʙaroi onon ʙehtar va ustuvortar menamud
